availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Marshall County, Kentucky, farmer. North Carolina native. Married to Susan E. Washburn. Married to Elizabeth Washburn. Father of Asenah Washburn, Polly R. Washburn, Rufus K. Washburn, Albert M. Washburn, John G. Washburn, James O. Washburn, William E. Washburn, C. Washburn, Sam Washburn, EIiza Washburn, and Hugh Washburn. Farmer in Marshall County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Marshall County, p. 470B
